column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////One of my favorite restaurants in Chicago
column2: though it can be PACKED at times.  I love the bacon wrapped dates and the spicy patatas bravas
column3: you can never miss with those two.  Their sangria is good and worth ordering
column4: but probably not the best you'll find in the city.  The service has always been impeccable and the food is so well timed
column5: you're never wondering where it is
column6: or overwhelmed with too many plates at the table.  Go with someone who knows what to order and you'll be very pleased with your meal.
